page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: Proposals giving rise to petitions, meetings etc include industrial development in Pyrford, extension of Heathrow-Gatwick Helicopter link and loss of woodland. Existing problems include aircraft noise, heavy traffic on minor roads, roadside litter, vandalism and burglaries. Ockham Post Office was robbed and it is known that the proximity of the A3 and M25 is encouraging burglars from London who can make a swift getaway. Local opinion in this rural area is strongly opposed to further development. Active social work includes helping the disabled, conservation projects, rubbish clearance, tree planting, Parish work, fund raising, visiting the house-bound,running clubs and generally contributing to the welfare of the young and aged.
